name: Spanish VAT Services Asesores SL
goal:
Spanish VAT Services is a VAT advisory services firm, mainly focused on International VAT.
The firm is currently the main VAT services provider in Spain for SMEs.
The firm provides advice on International VAT matters. The firm is currently representing more than 700 foreign companies doing business in Spain.
The firm has been recognised as leading firm in the field of VAT and as Indirect tax Leader in Spain in years, 2015, 2016, 2017 and 2018.
euInitiatives:
VAT Action plan
VAT and E-commerce
VAT proposals (2019-2021)
Tackling VAT Fraud
